005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * This Metapath exception base class is used for all exceptions that have a
012 * defined error code family and value.
013 */
014public abstract class AbstractCodedMetapathException
015    extends MetapathException {
016
017  /**
018   * the serial version UID.
019   */
020  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
021
022  /**
023   * The error code.
024   */
025  private final int code;
026
027  /**
028   * Constructs a new Metapath exception with the provided {@code code},
029   * {@code message}, and no cause.
030   *
031   * @param code
032   *          the error code value
033   * @param message
034   *          the exception message
035   */
036  public AbstractCodedMetapathException(int code, String message) {
037    super(message);
038    this.code = code;
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Constructs a new Metapath exception with the provided {@code code},
043   * {@code message}, and {@code cause}.
044   *
045   * @param code
046   *          the error code value
047   * @param message
048   *          the exception message
049   * @param cause
050   *          the original exception cause
051   */
052  public AbstractCodedMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
053    super(message, cause);
054    this.code = code;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Constructs a new Metapath exception with a {@code null} message and the
059   * provided {@code cause}.
060   *
061   * @param code
062   *          the error code value
063   * @param cause
064   *          the original exception cause
065   */
066  public AbstractCodedMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
067    super(cause);
068    this.code = code;
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public String getMessage() {
073    String message = getMessageText();
074    return String.format("%s%s", getCodeAsString(), message == null ? "" : ": " + message);
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Get the message text without the error code prefix.
079   *
080   * @return the message text or {@code null}
081   */
082  @Nullable
083  public String getMessageText() {
084    return super.getMessage();
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Get the error code value.
089   *
090   * @return the error code value
091   */
092  public int getCode() {
093    return code;
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Get the error code family.
098   *
099   * @return the error code family
100   */
101  public abstract String getCodePrefix();
102
103  /**
104   * Get a combination of the error code family and value.
105   *
106   * @return the full error code.
107   */
108  protected String getCodeAsString() {
109    return String.format("%s%04d", getCodePrefix(), getCode());
110  }
111}
